title: wine_Pessagno_2005_Intrinity_Chardonnay_(Santa_Lucia_Highlands)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 28579.
country: US.
description: This is a very low-production, best-of-barrels selection by the winemaker. It's an extremely tight young wine, austere and almost searing in acidity, with a yeasty taste from sur lies aging. If you're looking for opulent, immediately accessible Chardonnay, this isn't for you. But the wine has tantalizing hints of grilled pineapples and nectarines, and the powerful structure suggests cellaring. Stash this away for a couple of years..
designation: Intrinity.
points: 93.
